entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:36 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -32.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 09:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -32.4°C
Pressure: 103.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -36.3°C
Wind: WNW 18 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
